assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Godrej Industries Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and markets oleo-chemicals, precursors and derivatives, and bulk edible oils in India and internationally. It provides fatty alcohols, including lauryl, cetostearyl, cetyl, stearyl, and behenyl for home and personal care industries, as well as value added derivatives and specialty chemicals, such as emulsifying waxes, esters, secondary ingredients, specialty/actives, and blends; and fatty acids comprising stearic acids, oleic acids, fractionated fatty acids, and coconut fatty acids for textiles, rubber, polymers, foods and feeds, and personal care product applications. The company also offers surfactants consisting of alpha olefin sulphonates, sodium lauryl sulphates, and sodium lauryl ether sulphates for home and personal care, polymer, oil field, and construction chemical industries; and glycerine, a chemical used in food and personal care products. In addition, it engages in producing and selling of compound feeds for cattle, poultry, shrimp, and fish; processing and trading of refined vegetable oils and vanaspati; oil palm plantation activities; and development, sale, leasing, and licensing of real estate properties. Further, the company is involved in the finance and investment activities; processing milk and milk products; and integrated poultry, agri inputs and tissue culture, seeds, and gourmet foods and fine beverages businesses, as well as in the energy generation through windmills. The company was formerly known as Godrej Soaps Limited and changed its name to Godrej Industries Limited in April 2001. Godrej Industries Limited was founded in 1963 and is based in Mumbai, India.
